c1.name: A Cold Blade Like a Shadow
c1.effect: When **Enigmatic Feint**'s Enigma Thrust hits an opponent with Shadowsign, a vortex will be created at that opponent's position that will pull nearby opponents in.

c2.name: Endless Mysteries
c2.effect: Whenever the Bogglecat Box summoned by **Magic Trick: Astonishing Shift** fires a Vivid Shot, it will fire an extra Vivid Shot.

c3.name: Cognition-Inverting Gaze
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Magic Trick: Astonishing Shift** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c5.name: Obscuring Ambiguity
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Enigmatic Feint** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Watchful Eye
c6.effect: When Lynette uses **Enigmatic Feint**'s Enigma Thrust, she will gain an Anemo Infusion and 20% Anemo DMG Bonus for 6s.
